function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity and crowding in urban areas leading to rapid spread of diseases from person to person.","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread disease outbreaks in densely populated urban areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce crowding, improve sanitation, and promote personal hygiene in urban areas.","Technologies":"Sanitary infrastructure, wastewater treatment, and water purification technologies.","People":"Residents of densely populated urban areas.","Owner":"Local governments and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of infrastructure for uncontaminated and treated drinking water leading to outbreaks of waterborne diseases such as cholera, typhoid, hepatitis, and polio.","Impact":"Increased incidence of waterborne diseases in urban areas lacking safe water infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Investing in water treatment facilities, improving sanitation infrastructure, and promoting access to clean water in urban areas.","Technologies":"Water purification systems, wastewater treatment plants, and sanitation infrastructure.","People":"Residents of urban areas without access to safe drinking water.","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and water management authorities."},{"Description":"Social practices and communities shaping the emergence and locations of epidemic outbreaks such as syphilis and HIV/AIDS in urban areas.","Impact":"Higher prevalence of syphilis and HIV/AIDS in specific social groups and communities within cities.","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted public health interventions, education programs, and access to healthcare services for at-risk social groups.","Technologies":"Health education materials, outreach programs, and healthcare facilities.","People":"At-risk social groups and communities within urban areas.","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations, and healthcare providers."}]}
